Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released October 24, 2019
            
            Simply put, Goh Lee Kwang has spent nearly 20 years making music that defies description. His works covered a wide variety of avant-garde, electronic and field recording.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com 



 Goh has been touring / performing internationally at festival of contemporary art and music of cities in Asia and Europe such as Auckland, Wellington, Sydney, Canberra, Shanghai, Taipei, Kaohsiung, Manila, Jakarta, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Singapore, Bangkok, New Delhi, Dublin, London, Stockholm, Madrid, Barcelona, Ljubljana, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Budapest, Berlin, Hamburg, Zürich, Geneva, and Paris.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com 



 His first one-person exhibition 'Sound, Video, Visual, Media and Installation' shown in 2 venues: National Art Gallery (then rename to National Visual Art Gallery) and R.A.P. (Rumah Air Panas) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2005; his second one-person exhibition 'Good Vibrations' shown in 3 venues, REKA Art Space, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2007; Fluctuating Images, Stuttgart and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede, Worpswede, Germany 2008. In 2009 his third one person exhibition 'Wiring' including a 30 mins video, a live performance, 2 short video pieces (looped), some drawings and a sound piece (WAVER), were taken place at Findars Space and Klpac (Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Center), both in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. 2012 again he has a one-person exhibition at Findars Art Space, with 3 sound pieces, 1 single channel video, drawings on the wall, and a interactive opening performance with the audiences.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is the recipient of numerous awards and honors, including the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship, Stuttgart, Germany in 2004 -2005, Klangraum Fellowship, Krems, Austria in 2006 and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship 2008. Other short term Artist-In-Residency programs including KHOJ, New Delhi, India 2006; STEIM, Amsterdam, The Netherlands 2007 and 2010; WORM, Rotterdam, The Netherlands 2007, and Green Papaya, Manila, Philippines 2007.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is the founder of Switch ON, a platform for electronic arts in kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Goh is also the founder of Herbal, a music CD publishing label, Herbal released recordings by Eric Cordier, Eric La Casa, Jean-Luc Guionnet, Cédric Peyronnet, Beequeen, Roel Meelkop, Sabine Ercklentz, Andrea Neumann, Jason Kahn, Zbigniew Karkowski and many others.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is currently live and work in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.  



becomingshadow.bandcamp.com

www.facebook.com/anotherghostsdesign/
Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released May 4, 2020
            
            Introducing Goh Lee Kwang, a boundary-pushing musician with over two decades of experience in crafting indescribable music. His artistic repertoire spans a wide spectrum of avant-garde, electronic, and experimental genres. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh's artistic journey has taken him to various corners of the globe, performing and participating in contemporary arts and music festivals across approximately 30 countries. His captivating performances have left an indelible mark on international audiences. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Recognized for his exceptional talent, Goh has received numerous accolades and honors, including prestigious fellowships such as the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship in Stuttgart, Germany; the Klangraum Fellowship in Krems, Austria; and the Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship in Worpswede, Germany. Additionally, he has engaged in short-term Artist-In-Residency programs at esteemed institutions such as KHOJ in New Delhi, India; STEIM in Amsterdam, The Netherlands; and WORM in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Driven by his passion for promoting electronic arts, Goh is the visionary founder of Switch ON, a dynamic platform that showcases electronic arts in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. In addition, he has established Herbal Records, a music CD publishing label, providing a platform for diverse musical expressions. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh Lee Kwang's artistic contributions have made a profound impact on the global music scene, and his unwavering dedication to pushing boundaries continues to inspire both fellow artists and audiences alike.

Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released September 30, 2020
            
            Introducing Goh Lee Kwang, a boundary-pushing musician with over two decades of experience in crafting indescribable music. His artistic repertoire spans a wide spectrum of avant-garde, electronic, and experimental genres. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh's artistic journey has taken him to various corners of the globe, performing and participating in contemporary arts and music festivals across approximately 30 countries. His captivating performances have left an indelible mark on international audiences. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Recognized for his exceptional talent, Goh has received numerous accolades and honors, including prestigious fellowships such as the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship in Stuttgart, Germany; the Klangraum Fellowship in Krems, Austria; and the Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship in Worpswede, Germany. Additionally, he has engaged in short-term Artist-In-Residency programs at esteemed institutions such as KHOJ in New Delhi, India; STEIM in Amsterdam, The Netherlands; and WORM in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Driven by his passion for promoting electronic arts, Goh is the visionary founder of Switch ON, a dynamic platform that showcases electronic arts in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. In addition, he has established Herbal Records, a music CD publishing label, providing a platform for diverse musical expressions. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh Lee Kwang's artistic contributions have made a profound impact on the global music scene, and his unwavering dedication to pushing boundaries continues to inspire both fellow artists and audiences alike.

Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released June 24, 2019
            
            Simply put, Goh Lee Kwang has spent nearly 20 years making music that defies description. His works covered a wide variety of avant-garde, electronic and field recording.  



gohleekwang.bandcamp.com 



 Goh has been touring / performing internationally at festival of contemporary art and music of cities in Asia and Europe such as Auckland, Wellington, Sydney, Canberra, Shanghai, Taipei, Kaohsiung, Manila, Jakarta, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Singapore, Bangkok, New Delhi, Dublin, London, Stockholm, Madrid, Barcelona, Ljubljana, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Budapest, Berlin, Hamburg, Zürich, Geneva, and Paris.  



gohleekwang.bandcamp.com 



 His first one-person exhibition 'Sound, Video, Visual, Media and Installation' shown in 2 venues: National Art Gallery (then rename to National Visual Art Gallery) and R.A.P. (Rumah Air Panas) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2005; his second one-person exhibition 'Good Vibrations' shown in 3 venues, REKA Art Space, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2007; Fluctuating Images, Stuttgart and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede, Worpswede, Germany 2008. In 2009 his third one person exhibition 'Wiring' including a 30 mins video, a live performance, 2 short video pieces (looped), some drawings and a sound piece (WAVER), were taken place at Findars Space and Klpac (Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Center), both in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. 2012 again he has a one-person exhibition at Findars Art Space, with 3 sound pieces, 1 single channel video, drawings on the wall, and a interactive opening performance with the audiences.  



gohleekwang.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is the recipient of numerous awards and honors, including the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship, Stuttgart, Germany in 2004 -2005, Klangraum Fellowship, Krems, Austria in 2006 and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship 2008. Other short term Artist-In-Residency programs including KHOJ, New Delhi, India 2006; STEIM, Amsterdam, The Netherlands 2007 and 2010; WORM, Rotterdam, The Netherlands 2007, and Green Papaya, Manila, Philippines 2007.  



gohleekwang.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is the founder of Switch ON, a platform for electronic arts in kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Goh is also the founder of Herbal, a music CD publishing label, Herbal released recordings by Eric Cordier, Eric La Casa, Jean-Luc Guionnet, Cédric Peyronnet, Beequeen, Roel Meelkop, Sabine Ercklentz, Andrea Neumann, Jason Kahn, Zbigniew Karkowski and many others.  



gohleekwang.bandcamp.com 



 Goh is currently live and work in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Goh Lee Kwang.title: Main2 Live at Iskarnival Festival - Day 1
Goh Lee Kwang.about:
Me & Rithaudin Abdul Kadir (a.k.a. Din) did numbers of performances last year, and in different places. This is the second last one we did - the last one ended up more then 120 minutes, I spared you all by not sharing the recording - This is the complete recording of the set, recorded live at the Black Room during the Iskanival: Main​-​main Festival in Johor, I did all the sound, and Din did the spectacular performance.



Sound by Goh Lee Kwang; Dance performance by Rithaudin Abdul Kadir (a.k.a. Din)

Goh Lee Kwang.title: Single Line On The String
Goh Lee Kwang.about:
Art direction & design layout by Another Ghost Design 

www.facebook.com/anotherghostsdesign/
Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released August 1, 2018
            
            Introducing Goh Lee Kwang, a boundary-pushing musician with over two decades of experience in crafting indescribable music. His artistic repertoire spans a wide spectrum of avant-garde, electronic, and experimental genres. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh's artistic journey has taken him to various corners of the globe, performing and participating in contemporary arts and music festivals across approximately 30 countries. His captivating performances have left an indelible mark on international audiences. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Recognized for his exceptional talent, Goh has received numerous accolades and honors, including prestigious fellowships such as the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship in Stuttgart, Germany; the Klangraum Fellowship in Krems, Austria; and the Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship in Worpswede, Germany. Additionally, he has engaged in short-term Artist-In-Residency programs at esteemed institutions such as KHOJ in New Delhi, India; STEIM in Amsterdam, The Netherlands; and WORM in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Driven by his passion for promoting electronic arts, Goh is the visionary founder of Switch ON, a dynamic platform that showcases electronic arts in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. In addition, he has established Herbal Records, a music CD publishing label, providing a platform for diverse musical expressions. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh Lee Kwang's artistic contributions have made a profound impact on the global music scene, and his unwavering dedication to pushing boundaries continues to inspire both fellow artists and audiences alike.

            Simply put, Goh Lee Kwang has spent nearly 20 years making music that defies description. His works covered a wide variety of avant-garde, electronic and field recording. 



Goh has been touring / performing internationally at festival of contemporary art and music of cities in Asia and Europe such as Auckland, Wellington, Sydney, Canberra, Shanghai, Taipei, Kaohsiung, Manila, Jakarta, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Singapore, Bangkok, New Delhi, Dublin, London, Stockholm, Madrid, Barcelona, Ljubljana, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Budapest, Berlin, Hamburg, Zürich, Geneva, and Paris. 



His first one-person exhibition 'Sound, Video, Visual, Media and Installation' shown in 2 venues: National Art Gallery (then rename to National Visual Art Gallery) and R.A.P. (Rumah Air Panas) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2005; his second one-person exhibition 'Good Vibrations' shown in 3 venues, REKA Art Space, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 2007; Fluctuating Images, Stuttgart and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede, Worpswede, Germany 2008. In 2009 his third one person exhibition 'Wiring' including a 30 mins video, a live performance, 2 short video pieces (looped), some drawings and a sound piece (WAVER), were taken place at Findars Space and Klpac (Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Center), both in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. 2012 again he has a one-person exhibition at Findars Art Space, with 3 sound pieces, 1 single channel video, drawings on the wall, and a interactive opening performance with the audiences. 



Goh is the recipient of numerous awards and honors, including the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship, Stuttgart, Germany in 2004 -2005, Klangraum Fellowship, Krems, Austria in 2006 and Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship 2008. Other short term Artist-In-Residency programs including KHOJ, New Delhi, India 2006; STEIM, Amsterdam, The Netherlands 2007 and 2010; WORM, Rotterdam, The Netherlands 2007, and Green Papaya, Manila, Philippines 2007. 



Goh is the founder of Switch ON, a platform for electronic arts in kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Goh is also the founder of Herbal, a music CD publishing label, Herbal released recordings by Eric Cordier, Eric La Casa, Jean-Luc Guionnet, Cédric Peyronnet, Beequeen, Roel Meelkop, Sabine Ercklentz, Andrea Neumann, Jason Kahn, Zbigniew Karkowski and many others. 



Goh is currently live and work in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Goh Lee Kwang.credits:
released December 2, 2023
            
            Introducing Goh Lee Kwang, a boundary-pushing musician with over two decades of experience in crafting indescribable music. His artistic repertoire spans a wide spectrum of avant-garde, electronic, and experimental genres. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh's artistic journey has taken him to various corners of the globe, performing and participating in contemporary arts and music festivals across approximately 30 countries. His captivating performances have left an indelible mark on international audiences. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Recognized for his exceptional talent, Goh has received numerous accolades and honors, including prestigious fellowships such as the Akademie Schloss Solitude Fellowship in Stuttgart, Germany; the Klangraum Fellowship in Krems, Austria; and the Künstlerhäuser Worpswede Fellowship in Worpswede, Germany. Additionally, he has engaged in short-term Artist-In-Residency programs at esteemed institutions such as KHOJ in New Delhi, India; STEIM in Amsterdam, The Netherlands; and WORM in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Driven by his passion for promoting electronic arts, Goh is the visionary founder of Switch ON, a dynamic platform that showcases electronic arts in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. In addition, he has established Herbal Records, a music CD publishing label, providing a platform for diverse musical expressions. 



exceptionalfrequency.bandcamp.com



 Goh Lee Kwang's artistic contributions have made a profound impact on the global music scene, and his unwavering dedication to pushing boundaries continues to inspire both fellow artists and audiences alike.
